body: I need to see how he did his new mother, where the fuck is it.

Nice,caruta's work translated,now hope they translate 327430
This was very hot. Honestly i’m giving this a 5/10. MC is such a bastard in all honesty. I’d give this a 6 if the teacher isn’t married.
She isn't aware..No excuses..the Mc is a plain Rapist.

::facepalm:: This is like jr. high reading level, the author just wanted to tell the reader, even when MC got what he wanted by drugging her, he still felt empty since he had no interaction at all with her. He did not know her, nor did he understand what she is like outside of her role as the doctor for his school. Which is why "he did not know why she smiled". The act itself was truly sad since MC actually had feelings for her, not just lust.
no she doesn’t if she did then she wouldn’t say she wants to have a child w her husband
@Aridante That's the vibe I was getting. Especially with the final page's speech bubble as it feels like he's finally catching on.

this comment might sound at tad stupid but is it just me or did that last story page seem at tad suspicious like she was not actually drugged and merely faking or that she knew she was getting drugged and knew what was happening
